title: Favorite Park
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>So this is a park you like, Rin-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! Rin comes here often with Kayochin and Maki-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>There are lots of fun-looking playground equipment.... Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That slide.... That’s a good slide.... Very good. It’s a great place to announce your name....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, Rin recommends that slide! You can slide headfirst from it and go wooosh like a superhero nya<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Superhero! I knew you would also think that slide befits a hero, Rin-san! Umm, would you like to practice announcing your name there with me? Just in time for the little children to be gone too, so.... Let’s use this moment<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That sounds interesting! Rin will do it! What about my line?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s see.... How about “Run like the wind! Yellow Cat - Rin!”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin likes that nya-! Run like the wind! Yellow Cat - Rin nya-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
